price: Maka ketika rasa takut hilang dari Ibrahim dan kabar gembira telah datang kepadanya, dia pun bersoal jawab dengan (para malaikat) Kami tentang kaum Luṭ.
arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبَ عَنۡ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلرَّوۡعُ وَجَآءَتۡهُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ يُجَٰدِلُنَا فِي قَوۡمِ لُوطٍ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā dhahaba ʿan ib'rāhīma al-rawʿu wajāathu al-bush'rā yujādilunā fī qawmi lūṭin
